thread.title: Gareth Love
thread.title_full: Bella Barista - For Coffee Lovers reviewed by Gareth Love

author: Gareth Love
title: Gareth Love
text: A big thanks to Bella Barista! I had very good advice from the outset, ended up buying the maxhine of my dreams. Great delivery service and a couple of bags of coffee to dial in and enjoy. As a relative newbie (only ever used pressurised baskets before in a gaggia colour) I was able to dial the machine and grinder in well. Following instructions I was pulling shorts the same night far superior to anything that came out of the old machine. Thanis again Bella Barista!
